short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure your computer tabs with a password when others use your device, but don't pin it to your Chrome extension bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever had to share your device with someone and worried they might access websites you want to keep private? Tab Protector is here to help. Set a password for any tab you choose, ensuring that any specific URL under the root domain is secure. Just remember not to pin it to your Chrome extension bar.
❓What features would you like to see? More updates are coming soon!
